hero_title: AI and Optimization that Power Businesses.
hero_subtitle: From airlines to consumer goods, Tulipán helps companies unlock efficiency and growth through custom optimization, forecasting, and artificial intelligence tools.
about_p1: Tulipán is an applied mathematics and AI lab. We design custom models and digital tools that increase revenue, reduce costs, and unlock new opportunities across various industries.
about_p2: Our team of PhDs, engineers, and developers works closely with clients to deploy powerful solutions in record time—often in weeks, not years.
cap_title: Built for Complexity. Designed for Impact.
cap_subtitle: We combine applied mathematics, AI, and advanced engineering to deliver tailored solutions that boost efficiency, reduce costs, and unlock growth.
impact_subtitle: Leading organizations trust us with their most ambitious challenges.
impact_falabella: AI demand forecast to optimize inventory
